chunks.title: 4_Steps_to_Solve_Any_Dynamic_Programming_DP_Problem_144P
chunks.text: If you're studying for coding interviews, make sure that you watch this.

chunks.title: 4_Steps_to_Solve_Any_Dynamic_Programming_DP_Problem_144P
chunks.text: When solving any dynamic programming problem, there is four specific steps that you must do.

chunks.title: 4_Steps_to_Solve_Any_Dynamic_Programming_DP_Problem_144P
chunks.text: Your first solution should be done through recursive backtracking.

chunks.title: 4_Steps_to_Solve_Any_Dynamic_Programming_DP_Problem_144P
chunks.text: You get your base cases and then your recursive call.

chunks.title: 4_Steps_to_Solve_Any_Dynamic_Programming_DP_Problem_144P
chunks.text: But due to repetitive calls, the time complexity of this is O of 2 to the n.

chunks.title: 4_Steps_to_Solve_Any_Dynamic_Programming_DP_Problem_144P
chunks.text: Your second approach should be top-down dynamic programming using memoization.

chunks.title: 4_Steps_to_Solve_Any_Dynamic_Programming_DP_Problem_144P
chunks.text: That means using a cache so that if you've already seen a call before, you never have to do that function call again.

chunks.title: 4_Steps_to_Solve_Any_Dynamic_Programming_DP_Problem_144P
chunks.text: This brings our time complexity down to big O of n.

chunks.title: 4_Steps_to_Solve_Any_Dynamic_Programming_DP_Problem_144P
chunks.text: Your third solution should be bottom-up dynamic programming, otherwise known as tabulation.

chunks.title: 4_Steps_to_Solve_Any_Dynamic_Programming_DP_Problem_144P
chunks.text: That involves building an array where we go and get the solution in order from the bottom up.

chunks.title: 4_Steps_to_Solve_Any_Dynamic_Programming_DP_Problem_144P
chunks.text: That is much faster than recursion, not time complexity-wise, but a computer can do this much faster.

chunks.title: 4_Steps_to_Solve_Any_Dynamic_Programming_DP_Problem_144P
chunks.text: And it opens things up to the fourth solution.

chunks.title: 4_Steps_to_Solve_Any_Dynamic_Programming_DP_Problem_144P
chunks.text: Your fourth solution should be bottom-up no-memory dynamic programming.

chunks.title: 4_Steps_to_Solve_Any_Dynamic_Programming_DP_Problem_144P
chunks.text: We only need to store the information related to the current call.

chunks.title: 4_Steps_to_Solve_Any_Dynamic_Programming_DP_Problem_144P
chunks.text: And for us, that's the previous two values.
